item.title: 11th-inning homer lifts Dodgers over Blue Jays to win back-to-back World Series
item.description: Los Angeles is the first repeat champion since the 1998-2000 New York Yankees.

item.title: Most Americans say country is on the wrong track, blame Trump for inflation: Poll
item.description: Over 6 in 10 say Trump and GOP are out of touch. Even more say that about Dems.

item.title: Explosion at Harvard Med School appears to have been intentional, authorities say
item.description: Officers found no additional devices in a sweep of the building, police said.

item.title: WATCH: JetBlue flight makes emergency landing after losing altitude
item.description: A JetBlue flight traveling from Mexico to New Jersey on Thursday made an emergency landing after experiencing a drop in altitude, leaving several pass...

item.title: WATCH: Devastating aftermath of Hurricane Melissa in Jamaica
item.description: Entire communities have been devastated or isolated after taking a direct hit form the powerful storm.
